mapper.select: select * from typemssage where type_twono is null
select * from typemssage where type_threeno is null and type_oneno=#{type_oneno}
select * from typemssage where type_threeno is not null and type_twono=#{type_twono}
select * from ftypemssage where ftype_twono is null
select * from ftypemssage where ftype_threeno is null and ftype_twono is not null and ftype_oneno=#{ftype_oneno}
select * from ftypemssage where ftype_fourno is null and ftype_threeno is not null and ftype_twono=#{ftype_twono}
select * from ftypemssage where ftype_fiveno is null and ftype_fourno is not null and ftype_threeno=#{ftype_threeno}
select * from ftypemssage where ftype_fiveno is not null and ftype_fourno=#{ftype_fourno}
